Interface StateMachineEventHandler<O,S extends Enum<S>,E extends Enum<E>>

Type Parameters:
O - the class of the instance owning the finite state machine instance
S - the state enumeration type uniquely identifying a state in the state machine
E - the event enumeration type uniquely identifying the event sent to the state machine
All Known Implementing Classes:
DynamicChecker, StateMachineLogger
public interface StateMachineEventHandler<O,S extends Enum<S>,E extends Enum<E>>
The handler observing all the changes in a hierarchical final state machine. Enough information is provided to implement sophisticated mechanisms such as tracing, profiling or validating FSM during execution. All methods are defined as default ones to ease the creation of custom handlers.

      Parameters:
      transition - transition being fired.
      event - event triggering the evaluation

      default void fireLocalTransition(Transition<O,S,E> transition, Event<E> event)
      Callback before the action of the transition is processed.
      Parameters:
      transition - transition which action will be executed
      event - event triggering the evaluation

    • throwException

      default void throwException(Transition<O,S,E> transition, Event<E> event, Exception e)
      Callback when an exception was thrown during the evaluation of a transition guard or action.
      Parameters:
      transition - transition being fired
      event - event triggering the evaluation
      e - exception caught by the finite state machine.

    • throwException

      default void throwException(State<O,S,E> state, BiConsumer<O,Event<E>> action, Event<E> event, Exception e)
      Callback when an exception was thrown during the execution of an entry or exit state action.
      Parameters:
      state - state being processed
      action - action throwing the exception
      event - event triggering the evaluation
      e - exception caught by the finite state machine.
